hero.subtitle: Self-hosted reverse tunneling solution. Share your localhost with anyone, anywhere, using your own infrastructure.

features.label: Why fxTunnel
features.title: Why fxTunnel?
features.subtitle: A modern tunneling solution built for developers who value control, security, and simplicity.

control.title: Full Control
control.desc: Run on your own infrastructure. No third-party dependencies, complete data ownership, and zero vendor lock-in.

protocols.title: Multi-Protocol
protocols.desc: Support for HTTP, TCP, and UDP tunnels. Expose any service you need, from web apps to game servers.

security.title: Secure by Design
security.desc: Enterprise-grade security with TLS encryption, token-based authentication, and two-factor authentication.

advanced.label: Advanced Capabilities
advanced.title: Built for Production
advanced.subtitle: Advanced features that make fxTunnel ready for real-world use.

customDomains.title: Custom Domains
customDomains.desc: Bring your own domain with automatic HTTPS. CNAME for subdomains, A record for apex domains — Let's Encrypt certificates provisioned automatically.

inspector.title: HTTP Inspector & Replay
inspector.desc: Real-time request/response inspection with search, filtering, and one-click replay. Debug webhooks and APIs without leaving your browser.

websocket.title: WebSocket Support
websocket.desc: Full bidirectional WebSocket passthrough. No configuration needed — just works.

lowLatency.title: Low Latency
lowLatency.desc: Pre-opened stream pool and optimized 256KB buffers minimize connection overhead. First-request latency nearly eliminated.

metrics.title: Prometheus Metrics
metrics.desc: Built-in /metrics endpoint for Grafana dashboards, alerting, and production monitoring out of the box.

howItWorks.label: Quick Start
howItWorks.title: Get Started in Minutes
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to expose your local services to the world.

step1.title: Download the Client
step1.desc: Get the CLI or GUI client for your platform.

step2.title: Authenticate
step2.desc: Create an account and generate an API token.

step3.title: Create a Tunnel
step3.desc: Run a single command to go live.

protocols.label: Multi-Protocol
protocols.title: Flexible Protocol Support
protocols.subtitle: Whether you need to expose a web app, SSH server, or game server - we've got you covered.

http.title: HTTP Tunnels
http.desc: Expose web applications with custom subdomains. Perfect for webhooks, demos, and development.

tcp.title: TCP Tunnels
tcp.desc: Forward any TCP-based service with dedicated ports. Ideal for SSH, databases, and custom protocols.

udp.title: UDP Tunnels
udp.desc: Support for real-time and gaming applications. Low-latency forwarding for demanding use cases.

download.title: Ready to Start?
download.subtitle: Create an account and download the client to begin tunneling.
download.note: After registration, download the client and generate API tokens from your dashboard.

auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Your active tunnels
dashboard.noTunnelsHint: Use the CLI client to create tunnels:

domains.title: Reserved Domains
domains.subtitle: Reserve subdomains for your exclusive use
domains.noDomainsHint: Reserve a subdomain to ensure it's always available for you
domains.confirmRelease: Are you sure you want to release this domain?

customDomains.title: Custom Domains
customDomains.subtitle: Bind your own domains via DNS
customDomains.cnameHint: Point your domain to the server using DNS records:
customDomains.dnsGuideSubdomain: For subdomains (e.g. app.example.com): create a CNAME record
customDomains.dnsGuideApex: For root domains (e.g. example.com): create an A record
customDomains.dnsGuideSteps:
1. Go to your domain registrar's DNS settings
2. Add a new record (CNAME or A)
3. Wait for DNS propagation (up to 24h)
4. Click Verify
customDomains.verifySuccess: Domain verified! TLS certificate will be obtained shortly.
customDomains.noDomainsHint: Add your own domain and point it to your reserved subdomain via CNAME or A record
customDomains.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this custom domain?

tokens.title: API Tokens
tokens.subtitle: Manage your CLI authentication tokens
tokens.allowedSubdomainsHint: Comma-separated patterns. Use * for all subdomains.
tokens.noTokensHint: Create a token to authenticate the CLI client
tokens.copyWarning: Copy this token now! It will not be shown again.
tokens.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this token?

downloads.title: Download Client
downloads.subtitle: Get the fxTunnel client for your platform
downloads.noDownloadsHint: Contact the administrator to add client binaries
downloads.tokenHint: Replace YOUR_TOKEN with your actual token from the Tokens page.
downloads.step2: 2. Create a token in the "Tokens" section

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.subtitle: Manage your account settings
profile.twoFactorHint: Add an extra layer of security to your account by enabling two-factor authentication.
profile.scanQR: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app:
profile.backupCodesHint: Save these backup codes in a safe place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your authenticator.
profile.disable2FAHint: Enter your current 2FA code to disable two-factor authentication:
profile.githubNotLinked: Link your GitHub account to enable OAuth sign-in.

invites.title: Invite Codes
invites.subtitle: Manage invitation codes for registration
invites.expiresHint: Leave empty for codes that never expire
invites.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this invite code?

tunnels.subtitle: View and manage all active tunnels
